articles.author: The Star Online
articles.title: HSBC to exit US retail banking, focus on Asia - The Star Online
articles.description: HSBC announced it is withdrawing from U.S. mass market retail banking by selling some parts of its business and winding down others, in a long awaited move as the lender pushes ahead with a shift in focus to Asia, its biggest market.
articles.content: HONG KONG: HSBC announced it is withdrawing from U.S. mass market retail banking by selling some parts of its business and winding down others, in a long awaited move as the lender pushes ahead with … [+2013 chars]

articles.title: Asia, Americas look to the skies for ‘Super Flower Blood Moon’ - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: Phenomenon occurs when a total lunar eclipse coincides with the moon being at its closest point to Earth.
